heroPerk.name: Ow. My Eye!
heroPerk.description: Increase <ModifiedAttribute>Headshot</> damage up to <Number>50%</> based on the percentage of your missing <ModifiedAttribute>Health</>.

commanderPerk.name: Ow. My Eye! +
commanderPerk.description: Increase <ModifiedAttribute>Headshot</> damage up to <Number>50%</> based on the percentage of your missing <ModifiedAttribute>Health</>. In addition, <ModifiedAttribute>Headshot</> eliminations have a <Number>[Ability.Line2]%</> chance to conjure a <ModifiedAttribute>Phantasm</> (targets a nearby enemy, dealing <Number>[Ability.Line3]</> base <ModifiedAttribute>Energy</> damage in a 0.5 tile radius, <Number>[Ability.Line4]</> second cooldown).

abilities.name: Lefty and Righty
abilities.description: Equip two pistols which deal [AbilityWeaponDamage.Value] physical damage per shot and fire [FireRate.Value] shots per second. Lasts [Ability.Duration] seconds.

abilities.name: Goin' Commando!!!
abilities.description: Equip a minigun which deals [AbilityWeaponDamage.Value] physical damage per shot and fires [FireRate.Value] shots per second. Lasts [Ability.Duration] seconds.

abilities.name: War Cry
abilities.description: Shout an inspiring War Cry, granting nearby allies +[Damage] weapon damage, +[Ability.Line5] fire rate, and +[Ability.Line4] melee attack speed for [Duration] seconds.
